periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5am. Partly cloudy. Low around 72, with temperatures rising to around 74 overnight. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 90, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. South southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 95. Heat index values as high as 109. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Mostly clear, with a low around 76. South southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Sunny, with a high near 95. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 77. South southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 7am and 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 96. Southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night

periods.name: Friday
